definition: lit. to see only the other rider's dust and have no hope of catching up (idiom)/to be far inferior
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
dust/dirt/earth
do not/there is none who
surname Mo
and/to reach/up to/in time for

sentences.english: The transaction processing piece, meanwhile, has almost always had to play catch-up.
sentences.chinese: 而交易處理部門幾乎總是跟在後面望塵莫及。

sentences.english: Mardy says Roddick's career will sit on his 15 times over .
sentences.chinese: 馬迪說羅迪克的職業賽生涯仍然讓他望塵莫及。

sentences.english: I am still hoping for a dictionary that will leave Google in the dust.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然希望有一部可以令谷歌望塵莫及的好詞典。

sentences.english: China may just leave them in the dust.
sentences.chinese: 中國會迎頭而上而你們只能在後面望塵莫及。

sentences.english: In short, strange, magic in general are far behind.
sentences.chinese: 總之，千奇百怪，一般魔幻都望塵莫及。

sentences.english: Haagen-Dazs ice cream had its competitors licked.
sentences.chinese: 哈根達斯冰淇淋讓競爭對手望塵莫及。

sentences.english: South Africans chug down over 50 litres.
sentences.chinese: 南非則超過了50公升，令人望塵莫及。

definition: to run neck and neck/to keep pace with/to keep abreast of/on a par with one another
lit. only one branch of the tree is thriving (idiom)/fig. to be in a league of one's own/outstanding
to have perfect mastery of sth/to be up to the mark
(idiom) impossible to fault/impeccable
lit. not a common chord (idiom); outstanding/brilliant/out of the common run
excellent in every respect/flawless
to discuss two disparate things together (idiom); to mention on equal terms/to place on a par with/(often with negatives: impossible to mention X in the same breath as Y)
lit. two armies have equivalent banners and drums (idiom); fig. evenly matched/roughly comparable (opponents)
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
omnipotent
easy/with no difficulty
to show respect from a distance (idiom)/to remain at a respectful distance
to be unwilling to pass on one's responsibilities to others
countless changes/constant permutation
out of the ordinary
to shrink back/to flinch
